welcome_message_body: Welcome to Yoshikawa, Japan! This charming city is known for its beautiful cherry blossoms, historic shrines, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Yoshikawa has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection after a certain period of time.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Yokota AFB Airport is used exclusively for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
